channel.title: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help
channel.description: a friend of mine helped me get my server online by download a no-ip duc for me and running it on my laptop but when i took the source on my laptop to my comp and ran it didnt work it wont let me log on from my laptop, idk why its doing this i got the right source and the no-ip Duc on it running but it wont work, please answer me i really need help

item.title: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

kmsx:

when i go on my comp and go to 192.168.0.1 everything is the same as my laptops and how does my laptop have a diffrent ip as my comp, im trying to run on my comp and its the no-ip not 127.0.0.1

the IPV4 address and default gateway address, maybe you can’t connect because your no-ip is offline? from not portforwarding right? unless others can get on or the source may only allow 1 ip per connection teamviewer on your computer not laptop if so private message me

Read full topic

item.source: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help

item.title: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

which computer are you trying to host on laptop or computer? if computer you need to portforward again with that computers ip address. And are you having trouble logging in on your computer? are you login in with 127.0.0.1 or no-ip?

Read full topic
item.source: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help

item.title: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help
item.dc:creator: @kmsx kmsx
item.description:
@kmsx wrote:

i cant find the application part but when i go on 192.168.0.1 and click on firewall rules it says add then when i click that i change the service to 43594 (tpc/udp:43594) and then it says send lan server and i typ im ipv4 there, mind you this was all done about 1 week ago on my laptop do i need to do again in my comp or no?

Read full topic
item.source: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help

item.title: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_XGen RSPS XGen
item.description:
@RSPS_XGen wrote:

your going to have to reportfoward, just the fast part.
go to 192.168.1.1
then games and applications
You will see it says like name: (whatever you called it) port 43594 to 43594
without closing out of that, go to start, cmd
then ipconfig/all
you will se a number ivp4 address
the last 3 digets put them in where it says 192.168.1.___ on the website you went to next to the ports
You also may have to allow ports through firewall
Hope this helps!

Read full topic
item.source: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help

item.title: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help

the run.bat file works and i am logged on to the same duc but what did u mean about thr jdk?

item.source: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help

item.title: Why Does server run on my laptop but not my comp? please help
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

does the run.bat say something like “servername” is online or server listening port “portname”
or do you get “error cannot find the path specified”?
i’m not sure if i can help you, all i can say is make sure you’re logged in on the no-ip duc with the same account and have jdk installed. make sure your duc has three ticks and not two and a cross

Read full topic
